item.title: Fiber Optic Direct Connections To The Cloud
item.description:
The internet provides a wide and affordable way to use cloud services. However, it doesn’t offer consistently low latency, jitter, or high bandwidth, as it was designed for universal connectivity, not specialized performance. If your cloud-based business processes are slower or less reliable than when they were on-site, a direct cloud connection might be beneficial. A popular cloud service is Amazon AWS Cloud Computing Platform. This platform lets users utilize Amazon’s vast computing resources on a pay-as-you-go basis for various services like application and web hosting, backup, storage, content delivery, enterprise IT applications, and scalable databases...
